vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀστήρικτος, ον,
not supported by a staff, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; unstable, [NT+2nd c.AD+]; not remaining still, of persons, [Refs 4th c.AD+]; of water,[Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
unstable, weak
not made firm; unsettled, unstable, unsteady, weak 2Pet. 2:14; 3:16*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 不穩定的, 軟弱的 (彼後 2:14, 3:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 不稳定的, 软弱的 (彼后 2:14, 3:16)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bất ổn định; không ổn định
